A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Despite a brilliant performance from Mark Hamilton this isn't a good film. In fact it's probably the worst film of the entire saga. Most of the dialogue is clunky and a little cringe worthy\, character motivation isn't consistent with the other films. The plot is so gerrymandered together that you have to wonder what was the point of half of the action set pieces they threw in. \n\nIt feels like today is the day that Star Wars died.
